New Records: Shubman Gill scored 66 off 49, the highest innings by any player in the match.
India scored 182/4, their highest total in the series so far.
Zimbabwe's total of 159/6 was their lowest in the series.
Key Match Events: Avesh Khan dismissed Wessly Madhevere in the second over.
Washington Sundar took 3 wickets and made a crucial catch to dismiss Sikandar Raza.
Dion Myers and Clibe Madande formed a 77-run partnership, the highest for Zimbabwe in the innings.
Post-Match Reflections: India went 2-1 up in the series with this victory.
Zimbabwe's batting performance was criticized, especially the early exits of key players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Harare Sports Club, the same venue for the fourth game.
The series was a crucial part of India's preparation for the upcoming international fixtures.
Others: The article provided detailed statistics and player performances, useful for analysis.
